name: Naughts & Crawses
description:
Naughts & Crawses

A game of Tic-Tac-Toe!

GitHub Link: 

https://github.com/ImRainyDan/naughtsncrawses

There are 3 game modes:

Player vs Player Player vs Computer Computer vs Computer

The computer comes with 3 difficulty levels: Easy, Medium and Hard. It uses the minimax algorithm to figure out the best possible move.
